author: pawandhananjay
content:
we were discussing it here https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/1366516735469031654
the issue is that erigon nodes were run as full nodes which didn't store history. So pre pectra activation, when the CL requested for deposit logs, it returned empty responses. 
So all erigon nodes created a deposit tree with 0 deposits and non-erigon nodes created a deposit tree with mainnet deposits. That's the main disagreement here.

author: jtraglia
content: Ah thanks. I didn't know that thread existed!

author: pk910
content:
we unfortunately won't see any new deposit in the msf network soon.
I think everything works as expected. We're using the mainnet deposit contract, so the beacon chain started processing the 1.7M deposits from mainnet after the first voting period.
These deposits are all invalid for the msf due to the different fork version, but processing is still limited to 16 deposits per slot. 
So it'll take >106k slots (14 days) to process all the "invalid" mainnet deposits before we can sea any valid testing deposit :/

author: pawandhananjay
content: yeah that seems right unfortunately :/

author: pk910
content: we should use a different deposit contract for future mainnet shadow forks
